as you selected other: what are other pr: Recording plaintext config files, such as CFG files for Counterstrike or Keyboard layouts for Heliboard, as well as OSINT profiles for work.

we would love to know what your basic se: I am on mobile and unable to do so, but it is close to vanilla, with minor changes, such as a left sidebar, more responsive button elements (mouse cursor to pointer on clickable elements) a few quality of life plugins, but overall nothing advanced.
outside of plugins, palettes and other i: Adjustments to core and boot tiddlers, increased encryption to 256 aes, left sidebar plugin, etc.
what are we doing well? prompts for thin: When le thongs are slower because it is community run and organized, I think the outcome of decisions is ideal. I would rather slow and steady improvements that cater to what users want vs what most corporations do.
what could we do better? prompts for thi:
Making documentation easier to consume, such as more examples, possibly using images or web gift showing usage of different features, discussions about why one feature superseded another, recommended uses to achieve some functions, etc.

I also think a more public face would be good. I.e. a YouTube channel showing how to start with TW and get to a point where all aspects have been changed in some way.
with your consent, we would like to publ: Yes, I am happy for my responses to be published
